title: How can I update the mobile number linked to my EzySave+ by Maybank account?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [Can I open an EzySave+ by Maybank account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30242907568281-Can-I-open-an-EzySave-by-Maybank-account)
- [What is the interest rate in EzySave+ by Maybank?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/10982272215961-What-is-the-interest-rate-in-EzySave-by-Maybank)

- [How can I withdraw from my EzySave+ by Maybank account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30243135066905-How-can-I-withdraw-from-my-EzySave-by-Maybank-account)
- [How can I update the mobile number linked to my EzySave+ by Maybank account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/10989897690265-How-can-I-update-the-mobile-number-linked-to-my-EzySave-by-Maybank-account)
- [How do I close my EzySave+ by Maybank account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30243245720857-How-do-I-close-my-EzySave-by-Maybank-account)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

To change the mobile number linked to your EzySave+ by Maybank account, you must first change the mobile number registered to your GCash account. [Click here](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/9059222758041-I-want-to-update-my-mobile-number-registered-to-my-GCash-Account) to learn how.

Once youâ€™ve completed the process, the mobile number linked to your EzySave+ by Maybank account will also be updated within **14 business days**.

Make sure your new number is [fully verified](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account#h_01FPYEDSZ597DXA7JF5NWD6PBC) then [click here to ask for help.](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=360000706713&ind=normal&tf_360023219534=gsave__i_want_to_change_my_mobile_number_in_gsave.) A customer service representative will contact you in **1-2 business days.**
